typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		storeId as short,
		productCode as string,
		quantity as short,
		logQuantity as double,
		advertising as boolean,
		price as short,
		weekStarting as date,
		id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['RetailData/RetailSales.csv']) ~> SalesSource
source(output(
		id as string,
		productCode as string,
		basePrice as string,
		wholeSaleCost as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ProductSource
SalesSource, ProductSource lookup(SalesSource@productCode == ProductSource@productCode,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SalesFinal.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
